title: Ep58 Beyond Stupid: Scams
description: This week, the gals get acquainted with the big wide world of stupid scams. Topics include emotive Nigerian princes, a doctor with a medical-adjacent education and a thing for goats, and the minefield that is internet dating for elderly. Press your whole cluster with a bottle of Winc's Endgame Chardonnay, don't open that email attachment, double-check your surgeon's credentials, and tune in for Beyond Stupid: Scams.    This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
